Package com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui

Interface Summary
CardBoardUI The CardBoardUI class is an interface that must implemented by all user interfaces for the Cardboard Sets Game.
 

Class Summary
ActionMap The ActionMap translates all user interface actions into logic events.
CardBoardButton The Button class is used to draw one of the three Cardboard game buttons in the GameWindow.
CardBoardMenu The CardBoardMenu class models a Menu for the GameWindow.
CardGraphic The CardGraphic class is used to draw the Cardboard game cards in the GameWindow.
GameWindow Displays the state of the CardBoard game in a single window.
KeyBindings The KeyBindings class models all key binding for the game.
ScoresGraphic The ScoresGraphic class displays the information of all the player's Score's in a graphical display.
TextUI Displays the state of the CardBoard game through a console.
TimerGraphic The TimerGraphic class displays the information of a Timer in a graphical display.
 

Enum Summary
ActionMap.EVENT All the possible events that can occur from game window.
CardBoardButton.BUTTONSTATUS The ButtonType enumeration is used to describe what type of button is to be created.
CardBoardButton.BUTTONTYPE The ButtonType enumeration is used to describe what type of button is to be created.
GameWindow.DIRECTION DIRECTION represents the different movement directions for the selected card.
KeyBindings.KEY_BIND KEY_BIND models all the different keyboard bindings for all the different actions.
 

Exception Summary
ActionMap.EVENT.NoActionException NoActionException is thrown when an event's getAction command is called and that event does not have an associative action.
